name: Survival Island (SILLYWILLS)
description:
NOTE: You need to turn off STEAM to play multiplayer.

STRANDED ON A DESERTED ISLAND IT IS UP TO YOU TO FIGURE OUT HOW YOU'RE GOING TO SURVIVE. THIS TREASURE TROVE OF ISLAND ENTERTAINMENT IS THE PERFECT WAY TO GET LOST ON THE BEAUTIFUL ISLAND OF DEATH. HAVE FUN WITH A SINGLE PLAYER MODE OR LAN MULTIPLAYER WITH FRIENDS! WE ARE WORKING TO MAKE IT BIGGER AND BETTER WITH EVERY MONTH UPDATE! AS ALWAYS OUR GAMES ARE MADE FOR PEOPLE TO JUST GET LOST IN EXPLORATION. ENJOY!
